scan_metadata.description: ecs - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check container insights
check_functions.description: Checks if container insights are enabled for ECS cluster

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check Fargate platform version
check_functions.description: Checks if ECS service uses latest Fargate platform version

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check public IP assignment
check_functions.description: Checks if ECS service does not assign public IP

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check container readonly access
check_functions.description: Checks if containers have readonly access in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check host namespace sharing
check_functions.description: Checks if host namespace is not shared in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check host networking mode users
check_functions.description: Checks host networking mode users in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check logging block mode
check_functions.description: Checks logging block mode in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check logging enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if logging is enabled in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check environment secrets
check_functions.description: Checks if no environment secrets are present in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check privileged containers
check_functions.description: Checks if no privileged containers are present in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check public IP assignment in task set
check_functions.description: Checks if task set does not assign public IP

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check read-only port
check_functions.description: Checks if read-only port is disabled in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check privileged containers in Fargate task definition
check_functions.description: Checks if no privileged containers are present in Fargate task definition

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check host PID namespace
check_functions.description: Checks host PID namespace in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check host IPC sharing
check_functions.description: Checks if host IPC is not shared in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check privilege escalation
check_functions.description: Checks if privilege escalation is not allowed in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check root user access
check_functions.description: Checks if root user access is not allowed in task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check latest revision logging
check_functions.description: Checks logging in latest revision of task definitions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check resource tags
check_functions.description: Checks resource tags for ECS services

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check resource tags for cluster
check_functions.description: Checks resource tags for ECS cluster

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check tagging
check_functions.description: Checks if task definitions are tagged

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check trusted image source
check_functions.description: Checks if trusted image source is used in task definition

check_functions.description: Checks if latest active revision is used in task definition

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check ephemeral storage encryption
check_functions.description: Checks if ephemeral storage encryption is enabled for Fargate
